name: Hunting The Aurora
description:
Hunting the Aurora is a top down, action game set in a snowy region. You can fight through various enemies like a hammer wielding giant and a lava eel. Gain skills by defeating enemies to grow your strength and unlock new combat styles.

Watch the full gameplay video here:
